ygData.msgSnippet: Actually I m parsing it myself at the moment after trying your proposed solutions.... Perl is my language and I don t think I can do it without Perl - I m sure

Actually I'm parsing it myself at the moment after trying your
proposed solutions....
Perl is my language and I don't think I can do it without Perl - I'm
sure you understand what I mean... :-)

I extracted everything between <html> and </html> off the ARC file
discarding everything else...

After that I assigned an HTML::TreeBuilder object to it and now I can
move around the HTML::Elements and do whatever I want..

I think I'll stay this way...
Anyway thanks...
